title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Mastering Causal Expressions for Adult English Learners: Usage-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can use over 15 causal expressions utilizing MAKE, HAVE, and LET appropriately in context
Learners can express causal relationships with over 80% accuracy in CEFR B1-level writing and spoken discourse
Learners can generate 10+ sentences using English-specific causal structures without native language interference

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
